content.webTitle: Less copy protection in Windows XP MCE

fields.headline: Less copy protection in Windows XP MCE
fields.bodyText: Microsoft is reducing the level of copy protection in its Media Center Edition version of Windows XP. This is the version with built-in TiVo-style video recording. The original plan was that users would only be able to play back their recordings of TV programmes and movies on the PC used to record them, which is what the content owners -- Hollywood et al -- want.
